scene_description_enriched: A haloed male figure, identified by the inscription "S. Bartolomeu" as Saint Bartholomew, stands in a landscape. He wears a blue tunic and a pink mantle. In his right hand, he holds a large, curved knife, and in his left, he clutches a green book. The background depicts rolling hills under a blue sky with radiating lines, suggesting divine light. The scene is framed by a decorative border with blue and red floral motifs.
